name: -MOE-Droid- ADW Theme
summary:
It customizes it to a lovely home screen!!
It is "ADW.Launcher" theme of "MOE-Droid".
The wallpaper and the icon packing of very lovely "Roid-chan" are collected.
The wallpaper gallery can be used even if there is no ADW.Launcher.
moedroid.jp is Japanese MOE apps revue site.
info:
• 平台: Android
  • 开发者: moedroid.jp
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 售价: free
  • 官方网站: https://market.android.com/details?id=jp.moedroid.theme.roid
